abstract: The $458 million deal for the Travelex business  pushes MasterCard into foreign markets in the prepaid card sector.
snippet: The $458 million deal for the Travelex business  pushes MasterCard into foreign markets in the prepaid card sector.
lead_paragraph: MasterCard said on Thursday that it would buy the prepaid card operations of the British currency exchange company Travelex for £290 million ($458 million), pushing into foreign markets.

headline.main: MasterCard Buys Prepaid Card Unit From Travelex
